channel.title: Go baby near Boston
channel.description: I live in Boston and have a son with Down Syndrome- wondering if anyone knows anyone in Boston that is doing this

item.title: Go baby near Boston
item.dc:creator: elindsey
item.description:
I am a STEM teacher in Tewksbury, Mass and we are looking for recipients to build cars for, are you still in need of a car?

item.title: Go baby near Boston
item.dc:creator: GBGCT
item.description:
Hi! I am the coordinator of the CT group - send me an email at rosiethePT@gmail.com I am working with a group from NuMotion who is hosting an event in October in Boston - I would love to get your little one involved

item.title: Go baby near Boston

item.description:
Hi! Sorry / just saw your post. I donâ€™t know if anyone in Boston - there is a chapter in new Britain Connecticut (2 hrs). FYI Typically cars for kids with DS are relatively easy to modify.

Happy to connect you with them - email me jacgallo@udel.edu
